=== Test Plan ===

'''This test plan is not supposed to be complete; use it to guide your manual testing so they dont miss big functional areas that are part in the component; also this should be used as guideline to inspire the exploratory testing which should be adapted smartly based on the real content of a MP'''

==== Verify whoopsie functionality ====

* This test trigger a segfault, creates a crash file (/var/crash/_bin_sleep.0.uploaded), and verifies that a successful upload is done.
* Download whoopsie-test.sh from <nowiki>[[http://bazaar.launchpad.net/~ubuntu-test-case-dev/ubuntu-test-cases/touch/files/head:/tests/default/whoopsie/|repository]]</nowiki>.
* $ adb push whoopsie-test.sh /tmp
* $ phablet-shell
* phablet$ sudo chmod 755 /tmp/whoopsie-test.sh
* phablet$ sudo /tmp/whoopsie-test.sh
* Check that scripts outputs "crash file successfully uploaded".

Test case taken from <nowiki>[[http://bazaar.launchpad.net/~ubuntu-test-case-dev/ubuntu-test-cases/touch/files/head:/tests/default/whoopsie/|repository]]</nowiki>.
